articles.title: Samsung is delivering the perfect Christmas gift to Galaxy Note 20 and Note 20 Ultra users - PhoneArena
articles.description: Select Galaxy Note 20 and Note 20 Ultra owners in both the US and Europe are receiving a surprisingly early Android 11-based One UI 3 update from Samsung.
